Module count
Package count.ds

Class Phylogeny.Node

java.lang.Object
count.ds.Phylogeny.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Phylogeny.Node>
Enclosing class:
Phylogeny
public static class Phylogeny.Node
extends Object
implements Comparable<Phylogeny.Node>
Implementation for a node in a phylogeny.

      Returns:

    • setChild

      private Phylogeny.Node setChild​(Phylogeny.Node Nchild, int cidx)
      Adds a child to this node and updates the node counts. Sets the pointers between child and parent; sets child edge length to 1. Parent's number of children is unaffected.
      Parameters:
      Nchild - child node
      cidx - at which index should this child be set
      Returns:
      previous child node at this position (possibly null)

    • listNodes

      public List<Phylogeny.Node> listNodes​(List<Phylogeny.Node> node_list, Predicate<Phylogeny.Node> node_selector)
      Lists the nodes in a postorder traversal of the subtree. listNodes(null, null) gives all nodes in the subtree (including this node).
      Parameters:
      node_list - may be null; if not, it is used for adding nodes in postorder
      node_selector - condition for including a node; if null, all nodes are selected
      Returns:
      list of nodes (never null) in postorder traversal (same list as first argument, if not null)

    • listAncestors

      public List<Phylogeny.Node> listAncestors​(List<Phylogeny.Node> node_list)
      Lists the ancestors up to the root (excluding this root)
      Parameters:
      node_list - may be null; if not, it is used to add the noes
      Returns:
      list of nodes (never null) from parent up to the root

    • neighbors

      private List<Phylogeny.Node> neighbors​(Phylogeny.Node from, int distance, int mindist, List<Phylogeny.Node> neighbor_list)
      List of edges ending undirected paths of given distance range.
      Parameters:
      from - a child or parent with recursion on other edges; or else (null or this) recursion on all edges
      distance - nonnegative undirected distance, maximum (inclusive)
      mindist - nonnegative undirected distance, minimum (inclusive)
      neighbor_list - must not be null; neighbors are added on the given list
      Returns:
      neighbor_list
